mapper.update: update purchase set isbn=#{isbn}, id=#{id}, price=#{price}, purcount=#{purcount}, ordernum=#{ordernum} where purnum=#{purnum}
mapper.select:
select * from (select rownum R, P.* from (select * from purchase where
id
ordernum
isbn
like '%' || #{search} || '%' and purnum > 0 order by purnum desc) P) where R between #{startRow} and #{endRow}

select count(purnum) from purchase where
id
ordernum
isbn
like '%' || #{search} || '%' and purnum > 0

insert.foreach: insert into purchase (purnum, purdate, isbn, remdate, id, price, ordernumber, purcount) values(P_PN_SEQ.nextval, sysdate, #{item.isbn}, #{item.remdate}, #{item.id}, #{item.price}, #{item.ordernumber}, #{item.purcount})
